title: Loving Hut - Favoritenstrasse
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Formerly Go Veg Diner, now Loving Hut. Part of international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Uses organic vegetables and non-GMO products as much as possible, with a particular focus on sourcing ingredients from local producers. Tranquil atmosphere. Non-smoking.
